main_definition: Pertaining to or denoting something that is not shared with others; limited in access, membership, or availability.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Not open to the general public and available only to a select group
meanings_and_examples.example: The members-only club offered an exclusive view of the city skyline.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Unique or special, not widely replicated or shared with others
meanings_and_examples.example: She received an exclusive invitation to attend a private event hosted by a celebrity.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Exclusively used in the context of advertising and marketing for promoting products that are available only through specific channels, often at premium prices
meanings_and_examples.example: The designer clothing brand maintains an exclusive presence in high-end boutiques.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Pertaining to a particular area or interest group where access is limited and controlled
meanings_and_examples.example: This online forum is dedicated to exclusively discussing rare plant species.
